类的使用
com.google.android.filament.RenderTarget.Builder

  • 使用RenderTarget.Builder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.google.android.filament  

    • com.google.android.filament中RenderTarget.Builder的使用

      返回RenderTarget.Builder的com.google.android.filament中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      RenderTarget.Builder RenderTarget.Builder.face(RenderTarget.AttachmentPoint attachment, Texture.CubemapFace face)
      Sets the cubemap face for a given attachment point.
      RenderTarget.Builder RenderTarget.Builder.layer(RenderTarget.AttachmentPoint attachment, int layer)
      Sets the layer for a given attachment point (for 3D textures).
      RenderTarget.Builder RenderTarget.Builder.mipLevel(RenderTarget.AttachmentPoint attachment, int level)
      Sets the mipmap level for a given attachment point.
      RenderTarget.Builder RenderTarget.Builder.texture(RenderTarget.AttachmentPoint attachment, Texture texture)
      Sets a texture to a given attachment point.
